content: Always allow this tool to perform this action without asking againw

comment.text: This text is used as the label for a checkbox within a confirmation dialog. It allows users to permanently allow a tool to perform an action, preventing further prompts. Translators should ensure the meaning of "always allow" is clear in the target language.

usage.context:
<ModalDialog.Footer>
 <div className={styles.toolCallFooter}>
 <Checkbox
 isChecked={alwaysAllow}
 onChange={(e) => setAlwaysAllow(e.target.checked)}
 label={t("Common:AlwaysAllowToolCall")}
 />
 <div className={styles.buttonsBlockContainer}>
 <Button
 primary
 label={t("Common:Allow")}
